metadata.name: Bomberbot
metadata.desc: A simple Bomberman Clone made with Unity3D.

info.content: Bomberbot is a classical Bomberman game with 3D graphics and a futuristic theme.

info.name: artwork.png
info.alt: Bomberbot holding a bomb against his enemy, who is frightened.

info.content: One day, Bomberbot sees his garden crowded with evil Pestobots. If he doesn't do anything, they will ruin the peace of the garden.
Your main goal is to get rid of the Pestobots by planning bombs near them. After eliminating all the Pestobots in each level, you'll be able to advance to the next one.
